sources.title: Dozde Baghdad (1940)
sources.description: Prince Ahmad is the rightful King of Bagdad but he has been blinded and cast out asn all-seeing magic jewel, a flying carpet and a beautiful princess a beggar. Now a captive of the wicked Grand Vizier Jaffar he is cast into a dungeon where he meets Abu, the best thief in all Bagdad. Together they escape and set about a series of adventures that involve a Djinni in a bottle, a mechanical flying horse, a.
